description: Vermouth shouldn't be relegated to supporting roles in mixed drinks; it deserves a star turn And it's hard to imagine an aperitif simpler, or better, than the Marianito, which is nothing but Spanish vermouth on the rocks, with a twist or slice of lemon or orange, and the satisfyingly salty addition of a green olive.
title: Marianito Recipe
text:
Vermouth shouldn't be relegated to supporting roles in mixed drinks; it deserves a star turn. And it's hard to imagine an aperitif simpler, or better, than the Marianito, which is nothing but Spanish vermouth on the rocks, with a twist or slice of lemon or orange, and the satisfyingly salty addition of a green olive.
Featured in: Starring Vermouth.
